title: Echocardiograms may help with patient selection for transcatheter mitral valve repair

title_detail.value: Echocardiograms may help with patient selection for transcatheter mitral valve repair

summary: Clinicians should use echocardiography, an ultrasound that shows the heart's structure and function, when determining whether patients with heart failure and a leaking heart valve are likely to benefit from valve repair, according to new research.
